Anatomy Learning for Children

Anatomy X-Ray Game

(explore what is inside)

A simple interactive X-Ray game to explore internal anatomy of animals and humans. Perfect for curious little minds.
Read more
Play-Dough Surgery: Gallbladder Removal

(Gallbladder is a small organ that stores bile)

Learn how to perform a toddler-safe play-dough cholecystectomy, exploring gallbladder anatomy, the function of bile, and why gallstones cause issues. Fun and educational!
Read more
Play-Dough Surgery: Trichobezoar Removal

(Trichobezoar is a hairball that can get stuck in the stomach)

Learn how to perform a play-dough surgery to remove a trichobezoar (hairball) from a model stomach. A fun, hands-on anatomy lesson for kids inspired by real OR footage.
Read more
Kinetic-Sand Surgery

(tiny scrub suits, real-body wow factor)

A fun and educational sensory activity where kids perform "surgery" on kinetic sand to find plastic organs, learning about anatomy in a hands-on way.
Read more
